description.text: this message file contains message for system builder planner packages

msg.text: SBP file does not exist.
Missing arguments.
There is no SBP design open.
Missing device argument.
Unable to run drc, "$$s".\n
Unable to place resource, "$$s" at location, "$$s".\n
Unable to reset module, "$$s".
Unable to remove module, "$$s".
sbp_resource - Invalid arguments, check usage:\n$$s$$s.
sbp_design - Invalid arguments, check usage:\n$$s$$s.
Component $$s is partially placed. Place all elements from the tree.\n
Component $$s is not placed.\n
IO $$s was placed to pin $$s which does not exist in the device.\n
IO $$s in $$s was placed to bank $$d which support Bank VREF $$s.\n
IO $$s was placed to bank $$d whose vccio can be $$s, but not $$s.\n
IO $$s was placed to non true lvds site.\n
IO $$s was placed to non differential site.\n
IO $$s was placed to bank $$d which does not support $$s.\n
IO $$s was placed to bank $$d whose vccio is different.\n
IO $$s was placed to bank $$d which support Bank VREF $$s.\n
$$s::$$s and $$s::$$s share the same DCU. Invalid mixed protocols.\n
Component $$s Tx Data Rate does not match $$s.\n
Component $$s:$$s Must be aligned with channel number.\n
Component $$s second channel in the DCU is assigned to another IP.\n
$$s is already exported.\n
$$s is not a valid port or port-bus.\n
Port $$s is not exported.\n
Port-bus $$s or the dual port-bus is not connected through bus but has at least one bit is connected.\n
Failed to create net or port.\n
Port bit $$s is ready exported.\n
Net-bus name $$s is ready used.\n
Port-bus name $$s is ready used.\n
Port $$s is not connected through bus.\n
Port-bus $$s is not exported as a whole bus.\n
Top port $$s is not connected through bus.\n
Top port-bus $$s is not exported by a whole bus.\n
Port-bus $$s is not exported.\n
Port and port-bus cannot be mixed in one command.\n
Ports are not in same hierarchy level.\n
Port $$s or the dual port is already connected.\n
Port-buses have different width.\n
At least one bit of port-bus $$s or the dual port bus has been connected or exported.\n
Unable to connect more than one output ports or port-buses.\n
There is no output port/port-bus in connection list.\n
There is no input port/port-bus in connection list.\n
$$s is not valid net/net-bus name or format.\n
Net or net-bus name $$s is already used.\n
Port $$s is not connected to a net.\n
Ports are not connected to the same net.\n
Port $$s or the dual port is already exported or connected to a top-level port.\n
Port bit $$s in the bus $$s or in the dual port bus is already exported or connected to a top-level port.\n
Mipi pin $$s was placed to non-mipi site.\n
In-Out port/port-bus $$s cannot be connected to other ports.\n
Unable to export the port or port-bus $$s which is not on the component in top design.\n
Unable to export the ports of the component $$s which is not in top design.\n
$$s is not a valid component.\n
Fail to re-sync user imported module $$s.\n
Port-bus $$s is not connected to a net-bus.\n
Port-buses are not connected to same net-bus.\n
Unable to connect a port to a net-bus.\n
Unable to connect a port-bus to a net.\n
Unable to connect a port-bus to a net-bus with different width.\n
Input port $$s or the dual port has already been connected to a net driven by another port.\n
Port bit $$s in the input bus $$s or in the dual port bus has already been connected to a net driven by another port.\n
No port of component $$s can be exported to top-level.\n
No port of component $$s is exported to top-level.\n
The name of the net/net-bus to be renamed is not specified.\n
The new name of the net/net-bus is not specified.\n
Unable change the name of one bit in a net-bus.\n
The new name of the net cannot contain invalid character '$$s'.\n
The new name of the net-bus cannot contain invalid character '$$s'.\n
The net/net-bus '$$s' connects a pad pin. This cannot be connected with other ports.\n
The port/port-bus '$$s' is a pad pin. This must be exported to top-level.\n
The port/port-bus '$$s' must be exported to top-level.\n
The port/port-bus '$$s' connects to an internal signal and cannot be exported to top-level.\n
The port '$$s' or the dual port has connected to a signal which is not allowed to be exported to top-level.\n
Port bit $$s in the input bus $$s or in the dual port bus has has connected to a signal which is not allowed to be exported to top-level.\n
The net/net-bus '$$s' is an internal signal and not allowed to be connected with other ports.\n
The net/net-bus '$$s' connects a pad pin, the connection to top-level port must be kept.\n
The net/net-bus '$$s' is an internal signal and cannot be removed.\n
The net/net-bus '$$s' connects a port which must be exported to top-level. This must be kept.\n
The port/port-bus '$$s' or the dual port/port-bus is connected to an internal signal and cannot be disconnected.\n
Component $$s is not placed.\n
Not support import module with in-out port: $$s.\n
IO_TYPE '$$s' of element '$$s' in component '$$s' is not legal for this device.\n
$$s::$$s and $$s::$$s cannot share the same DCU. Rx and Tx can not be place in the same DCU.\n
There are $$d eclk bridges in the design which exceeds 2 eclk bridges device resources limitation.\n
Clock input '$$s' of interface '$$s' in component '$$s' is generated without any buffer. Planning for each interface needs special attention. Consult document for more information.\n

Clock source '$$s' of interface '$$s' in component '$$s' is not placed. It is recommended that user place the clock pin to this interface as well to ensure that the interface can be placed in the device.\n
Clock input '$$s' of interface '$$s' in component '$$s' is not placed in P-side.\n
PLL & eclk group '$$s' in component '$$s' are on the wrong sides.\n
$$s can be placed only after all DDRs IOs have been placed.\n
$$s cannot be placed.\n
All $$s groups cannot be placed.\n
All $$s cannot be placed.\n
$$s data not consistent.\n
No empty site for $$s.\n
No site for $$s.\n
No site for $$s feedback.\n
ECLKBRIDGE is not allowed for DDR71 interface '$$s' in component '$$s'.\n
Could not place resource, '$$s' at location, '$$s'.\n
PLL for the clock source cannot drive the DDRs.\n
Edge clk is not supported in bank $$d.\n
$$s DRC error found in Bank $$d.\n
Both DLLs are occupied in Bank $$d.\n
PLL for the clock source is in use in Bank $$d.\n
Clock Source cannot be placed in Bank $$d.\n
Clock Source cannot be placed in Bank $$d $$s.\n
Cannot find interface $$s.\n
$$s element cannot be unplaced.\n
Dll element not found with dlldel.\n
Cannot find Bank $$d.\n
There are no IOs in bank $$d.\n
IO '$$d' is not in IO ring.\n
There is no dq in the dqs group\n
Internal Error:$$s\n
Illegal bank orientation\n
$$s element cannot be found.\n
Element is not a buffer: $$d\n
DQS not found $$s: $$s\n
Clock source placement is outside the DDR bank: Extra edge clock would be needed.\n

Component '$$s' (module type '$$s' version '$$s') is not supported for reconfiguration in this version of Diamond. If you want to make any changes, please delete it and create a new component with this version of software.\n
PLL '$$s' is not connected.\n
If placing each pin of the interface individually then Virtual Vccios are not placed. It is recommended user place entire clock group together to place the Virtual Vccio.\n
Virtual VCCIO pins are assigned automatically and are listed under the corresponding interfaces.\n
Clock source '$$s' of interface '$$s' in component '$$s' is not placed. It is recommended that user place the clock pin before placing interface '$$s' in component '$$s'.\n
Cannot place two GDDR_7:1 receive interface in bank $$d because of ECLK resource limitation.\n
Cannot place both GDDR_7:1 receive and transmit interface in bank $$d because of ECLK resource limitation.\n
Clock port '$$s' in component '$$s' is not exported. Please export it to top level.\n
'$$s' has to be locked in '$$s' because of differential pin requirement, but pin '$$s' is already locked to '$$s'. \n
Cannot place '$$s' in Bank$$d because Bank$$d does not support edge clock. \n

Clock input '$$s' of interface '$$s' in component '$$s' must be driven by either a PLL or an IO Pin. The PLL or I/O buffer connections to this port are not found in this Clarity project hence Clarity Planner will not be able to place the clock for this interface.\n
Cannot place PLL input pin '$$s' because PLL does not drive DDR.\n
ECLKBRIDGE$$d cannot be used because both eclks in Bank$$d are used for another DDR. \n
PLL & eclk group '$$s' in component '$$s' are on the wrong sides.\n
Clock Source cannot be placed in Bank $$d.\n
Start scanning Bank $$d\n
LCT row DQS $$d\n
Skipping because of Bank requirements Bank $$d.\n
Skipping because of VREF requirements Bank $$d.\n
Skipping because of VREF is already used Bank $$d.\n
Skipping because of vccio requirements Bank $$d.\n
LCT row DQs $$d.\n
DQS $$s $$d $$d.\n
Not enough space for all dq Bank $$d.\n
Start scanning Bank $$d.\n
LCT row Generic $$d.\n
LCT row clock source $$d.\n
Clock source placement is outside the DDR bank: Extra edge clock would be needed.\n
